snippet: Ghana company Surfline Communications launched the country's first 4G data network on Tuesday in partnership with French technology company Alcatel-Lucent, making Ghana the sixth nation in sub-Saharan Africa to get the high speed service....

headline.print_headline: Ghana Company Launches Country's First 4G Data Network
headline.main: Ghana Company Launches Country's First 4G Data Network

lead_paragraph: Ghana company Surfline Communications launched the country's first 4G data network on Tuesday in partnership with French technology company Alcatel-Lucent, making Ghana the sixth nation in sub-Saharan Africa to get the high speed service.
